level.text: Each nursing facility shall complete an assessment of each resident’s functional, medical and psycho-social capacity consistent with the requirements set forth in 42 CFR ยง 483.20.
The Minimum Data Set (MDS), Version 2.0 or successor updates to this version, shall be used by each nursing facility.

Each nursing facility shall comply with the policies set forth in the December 2002 Revised Long Term Care Resident Assessment Instrument User’s Manual for the MDS, Version 2.0 or successor updates to this version.
